posts.content: Dear Forum Folk. In 2007 I spent a year restoring 'Dolly' our 1979 Bay reg NEC 511V. She was our wedding car and then got us to Spain and back on a 3 week surf road trip. I sold her in 2009 to fund the purchase of my current project, a 1966 Splitty with a 3.6 lt 911 lump running a 4x4 964 transmission. Any hows, I am searching for Dolly as I would love to buy her back for our 10th wedding anniversary. Yes an old romantic. If anyone can help in this search it would be hugely appreciated. Kind Regards JH

The good news is it's still on the road and is mot and taxed untill August 2016
You can check these details on the dlva tax checker
Hope this helps
